tidbits.title: Colonial Heritage
tidbits.description: The Dominican Republic boasts a rich colonial heritage, with historic sites like Santo Domingo's Zona Colonial, the first European settlement in the Americas.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country features diverse landscapes, from beautiful beaches along the Caribbean coast to mountainous regions like the Cordillera Central.

tidbits.title: Merengue and Bachata
tidbits.description: Merengue and Bachata music and dance originated in the Dominican Republic, reflecting the country's vibrant culture and rhythms.
